name: Cleverspeck
0:
”Alexa open clever speck”
”Alexa start clever speck”
”Alexa launch clever speck”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clever speck
des: The Cleverspeck skill provides company contact information including our company address and phone number. In addition users can create support tickets by saying Alexa, ask Cleverspeck to create a support ticket. Link your account using your Cleverspeck provided credentials to enable a more personalized experience. Remember if your account isn't linked, when creating a ticket make sure to include your companies name in the ticket description so we know who submitted the ticket.
